adv: The tool helps explore datasets and provides useful recommendations in terms of related measures and dimensions to enable getting useful insights.
disadv: Some of the visualization are hard to understand in their current form and could benefit from different types of visualizations to useful trends. Also there are limitations of the number of dimensions one could choose to plot. There are a lot of null values displayed in many charts. The
comment: I like the idea of book marks to save the visualizations that the user goes through and then refer back to consolidate insights. Overall the user study is very well conducted. Good job!!
